mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NOTICE.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY id DESC) AS rnum FROM NOTICE) WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (id, title, content) VALUES (NOTICE_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = ${id}
